example.name: Wsedit
example.synopsis: An example of how to edit a page in the wiki
example.example:
<wsform action="addToWiki">
<wsedit target="123456" template="template" formfield="formfield" />
<wsfield type="text" name="formfield" />
<wsfield type="submit" value="Find template -template- on page with ID 123456. Look for the variable -formfield- and change it to the value submitted />
</wsform>
